title: Introduction
text: Hello, I'm Htet Aung Lin, a passionate front-end developer on a journey to master the art of building beautiful and functional websites.

title: What Got Me Into Coding
text: When my school closed its doors in the second year of the COVID-19 pandemic, I started my web development career. I had the chance to explore the world of coding at this difficult time, and I haven't looked back since. Since then, I've been on a fascinating learning journey where I'm continually expanding my knowledge and skills.

title: My Interest
text: Beyond the code, music is where I find the most inspiration. When things get difficult in life, my guitar is the best thing I have to help me relax

title: My Goal
text: My goal is to work on innovative projects in order to get priceless experience. I'm excited about the endless possibilities in the world of web development and look forward to the challenges and innovations that lie ahead.
